com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean

Interface StatementMBean


  • public interface StatementMBean
    Interface for functions over a statement held in an Esper engine instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(javax.management.ObjectName listener)
      Add a listener identified by the object name.
      void addStreamNotifierType1(java.lang.String subscriberId, boolean notifyInsertStream, boolean notifyRemoveStream)
      Adds a notification mbean by type StmtStreamNotifierType1MBean broadcasting notifications.
      java.lang.String[][] getEventType()
      Returns the statement event type as an array of property name and property type.
      javax.management.ObjectName[] getListeners()
      Returns the object names of listeners of the statement, or an empty array if no a statement has no listeners or the information is not available.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the statement name.
      java.lang.String getState()
      Returns the current statement state.
      java.lang.String getSubscriber()
      Returns the classname and hashcode of a subscriber object attached to the statement, or null if no subscriber is attached.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the statement EPL or pattern expression.
      long getTimeLastStateChange()
      Returns the time in milliseconds of the last state change.
      boolean isPattern()
      Returns true to indicate that the statement is a pattern.
      void removeListener(javax.management.ObjectName listener)
      Remove the listener identified by the object name.
      void removeStreamNotifierType1(java.lang.String subscriberId)
      Remove the subscriber id from the active subscription list of the notification mbean.
      java.lang.Object[][] safeIterateType1(int maxRows)
      Safely iterates over statement results and returns the rows and columns of the iteration result.
      javax.management.openmbean.TabularData safeIterateType2(int maxRows)
      Safely iterates over statement results and returns the rows and columns of the iteration result.

      • addListener

        void addListener(javax.management.ObjectName listener)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Add a listener identified by the object name. Does not actually added the listener object as s subscriber to the EPStatement.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • removeListener

                    throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        listener - to add
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • addStreamNotifierType1

        void addStreamNotifierType1(java.lang.String subscriberId,
                          boolean notifyInsertStream,
                          boolean notifyRemoveStream)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a notification mbean by type StmtStreamNotifierType1MBean broadcasting notifications.

        Only one notification mbean will be created for a statement. The subscriber must remove the subscription to the notification mbean when done. When the last subscriber removed the subscription, the notification mbean gets removed.

        Parameters:
        subscriberId - the subscriber requesting the notification
        notifyInsertStream - true to notify for insert stream events
        notifyRemoveStream - true to notify for remove stream events
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • removeStreamNotifierType1

        void removeStreamNotifierType1(java.lang.String subscriberId)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Remove the subscriber id from the active subscription list of the notification mbean.
        Parameters:
        subscriberId - the subscriber if to remove
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • safeIterateType1

        java.lang.Object[][] safeIterateType1(int maxRows)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Safely iterates over statement results and returns the rows and columns of the iteration result.
        Parameters:
        maxRows - the maximum number of rows, -1 for unlimited number or rows
        Returns:
        property values as object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access

      • safeIterateType2

        javax.management.openmbean.TabularData safeIterateType2(int maxRows)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Safely iterates over statement results and returns the rows and columns of the iteration result.
        Parameters:
        maxRows - the maximum number of rows, -1 for unlimited number or rows
        Returns:
        property values as tabular data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an io error occurs and remote access
